ack.p: The authors are grateful to all study subjects for their participation. We further appreciate all CBO staff members who helped with recruitment and data collection for our study. We also thank the following organizations for their support in organizing and implementing this study: Beijing CDC, Tianjin CDC, Changchun CDC, Heilongjiang Provincial CDC, Shanghai CDC, Jiangsu Provincial CDC, Zhejiang Provincial CDC, Hubei Provincial CDC, Guangzhou CDC, Shenzhen CDC, Nanning CDC, Chengdu CDC, Chongqing CDC, Yunnan Provincial CDC, Shanxi Provincial CDC, and Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region CDC.

sec.title: Disclaimer
sec.p: The opinions expressed herein reflect the collective views of the co-authors and do not necessarily represent the official position of the National Center for AIDS/STD Control and Prevention, China CDC.
